verbs.description: [ARG0: attorneys] [V: settle] [ARG1: lawsuit accusing l a court of improperly suspending driver licenses for people who could n’t pay traffic fines] civil rights lawyers have settled a lawsuit accusing the los angeles superior court of improperly ordering driver license suspensions for people who could n’t afford to pay their traffic ticket fines saying the court has agreed to notify drivers that they can ask a judge to evaluate their abil los angeles superior court attorney los angeles county superior court antionette dozier western center on law and poverty los angeles gloria mata alvarado
